headline: Micron Ends Fiscal Year Strong as Analysts Raise Price Target on Growth
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the 12 Set-It-and-Forget-It Stocks to Buy Now. The company completes the FY25 with strong positive results and witnesses a rise in its price target. On September 23, 2025, Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) reported revenue of $37.4 billion for the fiscal year 2025, an almost 50% increase year-over-year. Primary […]
